mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account (id, password, name, email, phone, postcode, address, address_detail) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{postcode}, #{address}, #{addressDetail})
mapper.select: SELECT number, id, name, email, phone, postcode, address, address_detail, admin FROM account WHERE active=1
mapper.update: UPDATE account SET name = #{name}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, postcode = #{postcode}, address = #{address}, address_detail = #{addressDetail}
